casebody.data:
PHILIP MORRIS, USA, INC. and R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company, Appellants/Cross-Appellees,
v.
FONTAINE WALLACE, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Robert E. Wallace, Appellee/Cross-Appellant. Case No. 5D18-526 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District. Decision filed April 23, 2019

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

AFFIRMED.
